name: phpGraphy
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: phpGraphy is a free PHP photo gallery script released under GPL license.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:This site is using <a href="http:\/\/phpgraphy\.sourceforge\.net\/">phpGraphy<\/a>\n([^\s]+) - Page generated in [\d\.]+s\.<\/div><!--\/\/footer-->)
